channel.title: FlameGraph on Mengboy 技术笔记
channel.description: Recent content in FlameGraph on Mengboy 技术笔记

item.title: Go Memory Leak Triage in Production: pprof + FlameGraph Step by Step
item.description:
If your Go service RSS keeps climbing, drops after restart, then climbs again, you likely have a memory retention problem (or an actual leak pattern).

Do not start with random code edits. Run a clean evidence chain: metrics trend check → pprof snapshots → FlameGraph comparison → object growth path → regression validation.

item.title: Go 服务内存泄漏定位实战：pprof + FlameGraph 一次找准
item.description:
线上 Go 服务 RSS 一路涨，重启后短暂恢复，过几小时继续涨——这就是典型“疑似内存泄漏”场景。

别先拍脑袋改代码，先把证据链跑通：监控确认 → pprof 采样 → FlameGraph 对比 → 定位对象增长路径 → 回归验证。这套流程跑完，基本能把“玄学泄漏”打成“可复现 bug”。
